plot: These portraits of Santo Domingo are a visual reflection, which aims to define a number of characters through different elements and spaces, in the same way, each character is an illustration of a particular way of life of this city.
title: De objetos, sonidos y espacios
plot_es: These portraits of Santo Domingo are a visual reflection, which aims to define a number of characters through different elements and spaces, in the same way, each character is an illustration of a particular way of life of this city.
